forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
